tags: None
review:
I flew from Singapore to Delhi In Mar 2016, specifically for my dental treatment at SCODE (after hearing favourable experiences from friends) and was treated by both Dr Anurag Singh and Dr Meghna Singh.

Within a span of 10 working days, I had 3 molars and 12 old crowns removed and underwent root canal treatment and installed 13 new crowns. 

As someone who is extremely fearful of dental treatments, I am particularly very selective regarding the choice of my dentist. Throughout my entire dental experience at SCODE, my fears and anxiety were overpowered by the professionalism and care by both Dr Anurag & Dr Megna Singh. They took extreme caution to allay my fears and would always inform and educate me before they start all procedures. At every stage of the root canal treatment, they would also take extreme care to have X-rays taken to ensure that all are in order. 

With improvements in technology, there will always be better dental equipments offered in the industry but professional dental treatments that are personalised and delivered by passionate and dedicated dentists are rare.Throughout the period of my treatment, I was blessed to receive their undivided attention and care. 

As I had specifically flown in for this dental treatment, there were many instances where Dr Meghna had to dedicate the entire day for me.Given the magnitude of my treatments, it was extremely time and cost efficient for me as the same Quality treatment would have taken me so much longer and cost so much more in Singapore.

Hence , I would strongly recommend both Dr Anurag & Dr Meghna Singh and their team at SCODE.

Kudos to the team at SCODE.

tags: None
review:
Highest Recommendation to Dr. Anurag and Dr. Meghna at SCODE, Safdarjung Enclave, Delhi

I‚Äôm writing this letter to sincerely thank Dr. Anurag for successfully performing a very complicated jaw surgery (Maxillofacial) on me after I suffered multiple fractures and dislocated my jaw losing almost all my teeth and jaw functionality. I had already gone through multiple jaw correction surgeries however my problem was never rested and therefore I started my research to find the best doctor to get this surgery done for one last time and I'm I am so glad that I did my research and chose his practice. 

In a time when medical care has increasingly been more about running a business than about patient care, you and Dr. Meghna are an outstanding example of why the field of healthcare need doctors like you. Your skills and experience is what sets you and your team apart from so many professionals today. I have recently moved to Australia but if I ever need any dental medicare I  would travel to India to get his expertise, he is simply the BEST!

I will happily refer anyone that needs oral surgery to Dr. Anurag. Thank you again, and I wish you and your team all the success in future.

Harpal Singh
harpalsingh.in@outlook.com
India: 9888 502 502 | AUS: 0452 405 720

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I saw Dr Anurag Singh, as recommended by my dentist, for a second opinion about a TMJ ailment. I liked the fact that Dr Anurag made his own examination and assessment before looking at the MRI report and the opinion of the first consultant. He spent a considerable time explaining to me, with the help of drawings and a 3 D skull model, how the jaw works and where and why there is a limitation in my jaw movement.  He also provided some insights on how to treat the ailment. I would recommend highly a consultation with Dr Anurag if you are suffering from a TMJ disorder.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I have been associated with Dr Singh for around 15 years. 

I had terrible teeth and gums issues owing to the gross neglect on my part for many years.

Dr Singh has been extremely accommodating to my needs as I live overseas and can only visit him for a few days. I have had multiple visits to his clinic over a long span of time and always found Dr Singh:

Professional
Efficient
Explains the procedure well 
Quality conscious
Fair and Friendly
Excellent Follow up service

I have no hesitation is recommending Dr Singh to anyone seeking quality work at reasonable price.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I have been visiting Dr. Anurag since 2012, and I  always feel I am in safe hands during my treatment. I feel nothing will go wrong in my treatment once I am treated by  Dr. Anurag. I have so much faith in him, so much so that I visit him all the way from Dharamsala, though there are implant centers and dentists everywhere in my locality these days. But I make this nightlong bus journey to Delhi every time I have any dental problems. He helps me gain confidence in my work as a  teacher.  I owe him much gratitude. Thank you Dr. Anurag! May you live long to benefit thousands of suffering beings like me!
reply_text: Thanks Mrs Pelmo, it‚Äôs patients like you who have shown so much faith, it keeps us motivated .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Surgical Tooth Extraction,Dental Checkup (General),Dental Implant Fixing,
review: Dr Anurag examined my father who is 77 years and shared that surgical extraction was the best remedy for his condition. After that it was all done in a matter of a few mins. The extraction was not a simple one since the roots were quite deep and looked like a hockey stick impacting the adjoining tooth. The procedure was done without any inconvenience or pain and it was a super smooth process. Amazing job! ** ** ******* *** ** *** **** ******* *** * ******* ** ****** ******** ** ******
